00001 package newtonERP.viewers.firstStep;
00002 
00003 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.MoneyViewer;
00004 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.colorViewer.ColorViewer;
00005 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.BandDiagramViewable;
00006 
00011 public class BandDiagramViewer
00012 {
00013         private static final double maxWidth = 640.0;
00014 
00019         public static String getHtmlCode(BandDiagramViewable entity)
00020         {
00021                 String html = "";
00022                 double maximum = entity.getMaximumValue();
00023                 for (String labelName : entity.getDiagramInfo().keySet())
00024                 {
00025                         double currentValue = entity.getDiagramInfo().get(labelName);
00026                         double currentWidth = currentValue / maximum * maxWidth;
00027 
00028                         html += "<p>" + labelName + ": "
00029                                         + MoneyViewer.getHtmlCode(currentValue) + "</p>";
00030 
00031                         html += "<div style=\"background-color:"
00032                                         + ColorViewer.getColor(labelName)
00033                                         + ";height:32px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;width:"
00034                                         + Math.round(currentWidth) + "px\"></div>";
00035 
00036                         html += "<hr />";
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 return html;
00040         }
00041 
00042 }
